section.title: Mobicents Diameter Rf
section.para: Ro is on of two IMS reference point for charging. It covers offline charging - scenarios where charging information does not affect, in real-time, the service rendered.

listitem.para: CTF (Charging Trigger Function) - makes decision how to charge specific service for user, issues request/requests to server(OCF)
OCF(Online Charging Function) - performs actual charging based on received message type, service logic and user profile information.

section.para: Difference to Ro interface is that information/requests sent from CTF to OCF to no affect service delivery. CTF only informs OCF about units consumption. Offilne session charging has "session affnity" in terms it performs charging consequently for each event in session. For detailed information on Rf interface please refer to information found here and here.
